title: সর্বশেষ
intro: The page appears to be the homepage of the Bangladeshi newspaper Daily Naya Diganta. The content includes a header with the newspaper's logo and navigation menu, as well as a list of the latest news articles and sections like Bangladesh, International, Sports, Economy, Opinions, and Video. The page also includes some advertisements. Overall, the page provides an introduction to the newspaper's content and structure.
